Package com.petfoster.controllers

Class FosterRequestController

java.lang.Object
com.petfoster.controllers.FosterRequestController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000") @RequestMapping("/foster-request") public class FosterRequestController extends Object
REST controller for handling foster request operations.

  • Method Details

    • addFosterRequest

      @PostMapping("/{user_id}/{pet_id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FosterRequestDTO> addFosterRequest(@PathVariable Long user_id, @PathVariable Long pet_id, @RequestBody FosterRequestDTO fosterRequestDTO)
      Adds a new foster request.
      Parameters:
      user_id - the ID of the user making the request
      pet_id - the ID of the pet to be fostered
      fosterRequestDTO - the foster request data transfer object
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the created FosterRequestDTO

    • acceptFosterRequest

      @PutMapping("/{user_id}/{pet_id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> acceptFosterRequest(@PathVariable Long user_id, @PathVariable Long pet_id)
      Accepts a foster request.
      Parameters:
      user_id - the ID of the user whose request is accepted
      pet_id - the ID of the pet to be fostered
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with no content

    • getAllFosterRequests

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<FosterRequestDTO>> getAllFosterRequests()
      Retrieves all foster requests.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of FosterRequestDTOs

    • getFosterRequestByPetId

      @GetMapping("/pet/{petId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FosterRequestDTO> getFosterRequestByPetId(@PathVariable Long petId)
      Retrieves a foster request by pet ID.
      Parameters:
      petId - the ID of the pet
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the requested FosterRequestDTO

    • updateFosterRequest

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FosterRequestDTO> updateFosterRequest(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody FosterRequestDTO fosterRequestDTO)
      Updates a foster request.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the foster request to be updated
      fosterRequestDTO - the updated foster request data transfer object
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the updated FosterRequestDTO

      Deletes a foster request.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with no content

    • changeStatusOfRequest

      @PatchMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> changeStatusOfRequest(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody FosterRequestDTO forReqDTO)
      Changes the status of a foster request.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the foster request
      forReqDTO - the foster request data transfer object with the new status
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with no content
